conversation.message: Hi, I need help with my loan application.
Hello! I'd be happy to assist you with your loan application. May I know if you already have your 2023–2024 financial statements available?

context: Customer requesting assistance with a loan application

conversation.message: May iba pa po bang loan products bukod sa Business Growth Loan?
Yes po! We also have SME Term Loans at COVID Recovery Programs with lower interest rates. Gusto niyo po ba malaman ang payment terms?

context: Customer asking about loan product options in Taglish

conversation.message: Can I know the requirements for the SME Business Growth Loan?
Of course! We’ll need your DTI or SEC registration, valid IDs, financial statements for 2023–2024, and bank records. Would you like me to send the full checklist?

context: Customer asking for SME Business Growth Loan requirements

conversation.message: Pwede ba akong mag-apply online o kailangan sa branch mismo?
Pwede po both! You can start your application online for faster processing, tapos i-submit na lang ang supporting documents sa branch. Gusto niyo po ba I-guide ko kayo sa online process?

context: Customer asking about application channel (online vs branch)

conversation.message: What’s the next step after I submit my documents?
Once your documents are submitted, our credit team will review your application. Processing usually takes 5–7 banking days. Would you like me to schedule a follow-up call with you?

context: Customer asking about next steps after loan document submission
